subject: All Star Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: There was something for fans of every age, including a dunk, as the East trounced the West. It was the first time the East won a W.N.B.A. All-Star Game in seven tries.
snippet: There was something for fans of every age, including a dunk, as the East trounced the West. It was the first time the East won a W.N.B.A. All-Star Game in seven tries.
